definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Studies of these minerals show they are hypergene minerals formed from weathering of apatite.
sentences.chinese: 研究認爲它們是磷灰石風化作用形成的表生礦物。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on mineral weathering by silicate bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 研究了硅酸鹽細菌對礦物的風化作用。

sentences.english: All of the bauxites are formed by weathering without any exception.
sentences.chinese: 鋁土礦全部是風化作用形成的，無一例外。

sentences.english: Certain plants play an additional role in weathering.
sentences.chinese: 某些植物起了風化作用的輔助作用。

sentences.english: The continuous dynamics of the erosion and the transformation of the natural landscape result in an unusual environment.
sentences.chinese: 持續的風化作用和自然地貎的改變導致罕見的環境。
